EmailTemplate.name: ATS Case transfer to Repair and Overhaul
EmailTemplate.subject: ATS Case transfer to Repair and Overhaul
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Customer,
Thank you for your email requesting repair and overhaul support. To ensure your issue is resolved as quickly as possible, we forwarded your information to our repair and overhaul experts at aerorepairs@honeywell.com. An expert from that team will contact you very soon to resolve your question.
During the short wait, did you know you can access immediate support resources by accessing the Honeywell MyAerospace portal at www.myaerospace.com? Here you can also find technical videos, solutions to common questions and even information about your parts and repair orders.
For future repair and overhaul questions, feel free to contact the team at aerorepairs@honeywell.com. For other technical support requests, visit www.myaerospace.com.
Thank you for contacting Aerospace Technical Support.
